name: @optimal/fn
description: Force V8 to try to optimize a function and check optimization status.
author: Eli Doran <eli+npm@elidoran.com>

scripts.test-all: npm run test4 && npm run test6 && npm run test7 && npm run test8
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require build/coverage.js -R spec  test/lib/coffee test/lib/js
scripts.coverage-lcov: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require build/coverage.js -R spec  test/lib/coffee test/lib/js
